summary: This bill mandates that all aircraft, including military aircraft, operating in Class B airspace in the national airspace system must install and operate ADS–B In and ADS–B Out equipment. It sets performance requirements specified by the FAA Administrator, effective upon enactment.  The bill also repeals a previous exemption concerning ADS-B equipment for Department of Defense aircraft detailed in the John S. McCain National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2019.
